title: SensorModel
description: A specification or model of a sensor, describing the types of variables it can observe.

sensorModelId.description: Internal or URI identifier for the sensor model.

sensorModelName.description: The commercial or technical name of the sensor model (e.g., Seabird SBE 37).

supportsVariable.description: Variables that this sensor model can observe.

hasManufacturer.description: The organization that manufactures this sensor model.
